items.description: Currently working on an arcade-style pixelart game inspired by SCP lore. Responsible for sprites, character animations and visual style.

items.description: Created art assets, UI elements and textures for the indie horror game SCP: Observer. Contributed to visual style and game interface.

items.description: Visual identity, website graphics and social media content for local esports organization. Designed assets for streams, tournaments and community.

items.description: Created full stream design assets including emotes, overlays and offline screens. Co-hosted and organized osu! tournaments with a Twitch streamer.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.generalText: The protection of your personal data is very important to us. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations.
privacy.dataCollectionText: Your data is collected when you provide it to us. Other data is automatically collected by IT systems when visiting the website (e.g., browser, time of visit).
privacy.rightsText: You have the right at any time to receive information free of charge about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data. You also have the right to request correction, blocking, or deletion of this data.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about data protection, please contact:
